programme.title: Ramon the Mexican
programme.desc: Ramon avenges his brother's murder and kills the Baxter Family.

programme.title: Two Brothers in Trinity
programme.desc: After inheriting a land plot in a dusty place called Trinity, the antagonistic half-brothers, Lester and Jesse, reunite to pursue different aspirations, only to find themselves neck-deep in trouble. Will they ever fulfil their dreams?

programme.title: Black Killer
programme.desc: In Tombstone, a new sheriff vows to clean up the town of outlaws like the O'Hara brothers and is assisted by a strange lawyer who always carries two large law books with him.

programme.title: Dig Your Grave Friend... Sabata's Coming
programme.desc: Steve McGowan returns from war to avenge his father’s murder by a ruthless landowner. Imprisoned, he escapes with a bandit and steals a stagecoach—only to find the villain’s fiancée inside. As hired guns close in, alliances shift, and the fight for justice takes an unexpected turn.

programme.title: The Counterfeit Kid
programme.desc: Jack, a farmhand, accidentally impersonates the notorious outlaw "Bloody" Ben Harris. Now, on a treasure hunt, he must rely on a group of wild misfits to outsmart the outlaw he's pretending to be. With Harris hot on his trail, Jack must find the treasure and return to his true love, Olivia, before it’s too late.

programme.title: The Shooting
programme.desc: A mysterious woman persuades two cowboys to help her in a revenge scheme.

programme.title: Captain Apache
programme.desc: A Native American born US Army officer, Captain Apache, investigating a murder, uncovers a presidential assassination plot.

programme.title: Bastard, Go and Kill
programme.desc: Chaco, a Mexican on the run from just about everyone, is framed for the killing of a couple of cattlemen.

programme.title: Gunman of One Hundred Crosses
programme.desc: An Irishman is killed in the wild West. His son Jimmy goes out searching for the killers of his father, but is soon ambushed by two highwaymen, and killed, too.

programme.title: The Legend of the Lone Ranger
programme.desc: The sole surviving Texas Ranger (Klinton Spilsbury) of an ambush arranged by outlaw leader Major Bartholomew "Butch" Cavendish (Christopher Lloyd) returns to fight back as a great masked western hero, The Lone Ranger.

programme.title: Dead Men Don't Count
programme.desc: Two gunmen ride into a town with a plan to collect a large unearned bounty but are caught up in the local war for land caused by the impending arrival of the railroad.

programme.title: Gentleman Killer
programme.desc: A border town is thrust into political chaos when a Mexican bandit targets US soldiers, killing them relentlessly. As tensions escalate between the US and Mexico, the bandit becomes a symbol of defiance. The town becomes a battleground, with both sides caught in a dangerous game of revenge and retaliation.

programme.title: Three Ruthless Ones
programme.desc: The Walker brothers took different paths—one an outlaw, one a Marshal, one a rancher. Yet they share one goal: avenging their father’s murder. When they finally find the killer, their clashing ideals lead to a deadly showdown.

programme.title: Shoot the Living and Pray for the Dead
programme.desc: After Dan Hogan and his gang rob a bank, they hire a mysterious man to guide them across the Mexican border in return for half of the loot.
